title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
description: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

title: Golteum (GLTM) Presale Presents The Launch Of Crypto-Enabled Metals Investment Platform
description: As the cryptocurrency market becomes increasingly volatile, investors seek alternative measures to diversify their portfolios and protect their wealth.
